goal.ch: 幫助同學建立配位化合物的結構知識。建立預測配位化合物的物理及化學性質的知識。學習配位化合物的反應機構。
goal.en: This course aims to help students develop more advanced knowledge  about the physical and chemical properties of coordination compounds (including transition metals and non-transition metals), their chemical reactions, and reaction mechanisms.

outline.ch: ●Basic Knowledge of Coordination Compounds (week 1)●Coordination Bonds (week 2)●Electronic Spectra and Magnetism of Coordination Compounds (week 3-4)●Coordination Numbers and Structures (week 5-6)●Isomerism of Coordination Compounds (week 7-8)●Mid-term Exam (week 9)●Introduction of Reaction Mechanism of Coordination Compounds (week 10)●Reaction Mechanisms of Four-Coordinate Complexes (week 11-12)●Reaction Mechanisms of Six-Coordinate Complexes (week 13-14)●Electron Transfer Reactions (week 15-16)●Ligands and Complexes (week 17)●Final Exam (week 18)
outline.en: ●Basic Knowledge of Coordination Compounds (week 1)●Coordination Bonds (week 2)●Electronic Spectra and Magnetism of Coordination Compounds (week 3-4)●Coordination Numbers and Structures (week 5-6)●Isomerism of Coordination Compounds (week 7-8)●Mid-term Exam (week 9)●Introduction of Reaction Mechanism of Coordination Compounds (week 10)●Reaction Mechanisms of Four-Coordinate Complexes (week 11-12)●Reaction Mechanisms of Six-Coordinate Complexes (week 13-14)●Electron Transfer Reactions (week 15-16)●Ligands and Complexes (week 17)●Final Exam (week 18)

textbook.ch: Essentials of Coordination Chemistry: A Simplified Approach with 3D Visuals, 1st Edition, Vasishta Bhatt, Elsevier, 2015Introduction to Coordination Chemistry, Geoffrey A. Lawrance, Wiley, 2009
textbook.en: Essentials of Coordination Chemistry: A Simplified Approach with 3D Visuals, 1st Edition, Vasishta Bhatt, Elsevier, 2015Introduction to Coordination Chemistry, Geoffrey A. Lawrance, Wiley, 2009

ch.competencies: 具備研究領域之專業知識
可規劃並執行專題研究，並將成果撰寫成論文發表
與不同研究領域人員協調以解決化學課題
具足夠的外語能力可有效的與外籍人士溝通
自我鞭策不斷學習新知識

en.competencies: Be equipped with expertise in specific research disciplines.
Be capable of planning and performing research activity and summarizing results in a published form in the end.
Be initiative to interact with others with different backgrounds and coordinate effort to overcome obstacles.
Be able to communicate with foreigners effectively.
Be self-driven constantly to explore science.

ch: 系所:限化學學系碩士班、化學學系博士班。
系所:限化學學系。年級:限三年級、四年級、延修生。
en: Department:MSc in Chemistry、PhD in Chemistry only.
Department:Department of Chemistry only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year、Deferred Student only.
